## IHasher interface

Cryptographic hashing service contract

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IHasher 
```

## Remarks

Provides secure password hashing and verification capabilities. This interface abstracts the underlying hashing algorithm, allowing for easy implementation swaps (bcrypt, argon2, etc.).
